casebody.data:
ARMSTRONG
v.
D.C. AUTOMOTIVE, et al. No. 490P06-3. Supreme Court of North Carolina. December 6, 2007. Mayor of the City of Wilson, for D.C. Automotive.

The following order has been entered on the motion filed on the 24th day of May 2007 by Plaintiff for judgment with supporting affidavit and documentation in his favor and against appellees:

"Motion Dismissed by order of the Court in conference this the 6th day of December 2007."
